description: Schengen Visitor Visa (Type C). Note: Official 'Carta de Invitación' required if staying with friends.

meta.processing_time_standard: 15 Calendar Days (Can be longer in peak season)
meta.min_funds_requirement: Min. 113 EUR/day per person. Minimum total: 1,020 EUR (90% of SMI).

add.title: Carta de Invitación (Official Invitation)
add.description: If staying with a private host, a simple letter is NOT enough. The host must obtain an official 'Carta de Invitación' from the Spanish National Police.

steps_flow.title: Fill Application Form
steps_flow.description: Download and fill the Schengen Visa application form for Spain.

steps_flow.title: Book Appointment
steps_flow.description: Book a slot with BLS International (Official partner for Spain).

steps_flow.title: Submit Application
steps_flow.description: Submit documents and biometrics at the BLS center.
